short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create vocabulary flashcards on the fly using AnkiLingual.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create vocabulary flashcards with images on the fly using AnkiLingual. AnkiLingual helps you quickly create Anki flashcards for vocabulary with optional translations and images.

While trying to create Spanish vocabulary flashcards, I was tediously downloading images and taking a lot of time to add cards. I created this extension so I could quickly create vocabulary flashcards as I was browsing. It also made it faster to look up and attach images.
